author: James Van Straten
title: Growing Stacks of Bitcoin Long-Term Holders Signals Bullish Outlook
description: As the bitcoin counts of long-term holders has increased, that of short-term holders has fallen.
content:
Long-term holder (LTH) bitcoin supply, as tracked by Glassnode, has surged to a record 14.46 million BTC, signaling confidence that price gains are in store. 
LTHs, defined as investors holding bitc… [+909 chars]
